author: King1N

text: I loved this game. It had a really simple concept; destroy anything that's in your way. I can't describe how hilarious it was to watch some robot do some acrobatic stuff into a building, smashing it into pieces. My favourite vehicle was probably the Bulldozer; ramming everything you see. And the vehicle I hated most was the damn truck which required you to ram your ass into buildings to damage them - it was so damn hard to control.
